question: Who won the third Madrid Open title?
explanation: Petra Kvitova outlasted her Dutch opponent Kiki Bertens 7-6 (8-6) 4-6 6-3 in the finals to clinch the third Madrid Open title. Kvitova, the victor in Spain in 2011 and 2015, becomes the first woman to win the tournament three times. Kvitova has now claimed four titles in 2018 after triumphs in St Petersburg, Doha and Prague.
